0:
Assalam O Alaikum Everyone, It's Qayamat TV Official Youtube Channel.
Purpose of My Youtube channel is to provide people Knowledge along with the lyrics of the poetic piece and not only this,we also focus on reciting short stories,lines and quotations of different writers and let the people hear and watch the content. We try to bring the best of the best literature pieces to our viewer and different from the mainstream poems,ghazals,verses,para,etc.
As the time has advanced so the way to spread literature has to be advanced too.

Do give your feedback.
Thank You!
Qayamat TV 




*Note*
Whatever poetry, quotations, stories  I do, I take all of them from Google, WhatsApp, Facebook, and Books.
&
I am neither a poet nor a writer, I am simply a narrator. I Just Present the magical words in my own way in my own style.
.
Thank You!
